attributes.action: Make all MP/Government employee allowances match the same accountability rules as for the general population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CH4 Dispatches:Nice Work If You Can Get It,claims that MP's can manipulate the system to obtain money from the taxpayer without accounting for it.The rules are set-up to stop the taxpayer looking into MP expenses and asking awkward questions of them.The lowest to the highest MPs make bland statements about government accountability knowing that they will never do anything about it in case it affects their finances/careers.If these paragons of virtue really have the taxpayer at heart,then they would change all the rules on MP expenses.These changes would ensure complete transparency of everything claimed from the taxes to ensure that no politician can be accused of “feathering their own nest”.Receipts should accompany all business items purchased by MP’s etc and should be made available under all FOI Acts within short time limits and not be withheld in any way.Parliament rules must be the same as the rest of the country.Allowances and other financial packages should be clearly traceable down to the last penny by any taxpayer.All financial rules that our MP’s work by, must be exactly the same that everybody else in the country has to work by-no exceptions.
